channel.title: Getting started on ZORRO
channel.description: Recent content in Getting started on ZORRO

item.title: Build from the source code
item.description: Build From Source Code # Test machine # ubuntu16.04 / go1.13.11 1. Install dependency libraries and Get the source code # apt-get install -y build-essential apt-get install libboost-all-dev apt-get install libgmp-dev go env -w GO111MODULE=off cd $GOPATH/src/github.com mkdir ZorroChain cd ZorroChain git clone https://github.com/ZorroChain/zorro.git 2. Config library path before start node # windows # cmd: set path=%path%;%gopath%\src\github.com\ZorroChain\zorro\czk\czero\lib_WINDOWS_AMD64 # powershell: $env:path=$env:path+";"+$env:gopath+"\src\github.com\ZorroChain\zorro\czk\czero\lib_WINDOWS_AMD64" mac export DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH=$GOPATH/src/github.

item.title: Console operation
item.description: Console Base Operation # Test machine # ubuntu16.04 / go1.13.11 1. Start the zro console # zro --exchange --mineMode --stake --rpc --rpcaddr="0.0.0.0" --dashboard --vmodule=dashboard=5 --rpcvhosts="*" --rpccorsdomain="*" --rpcapi="exchange,zorro,net,stake" --exchangeValueStr zro attach 2. Accounts management # Create account # > personal.newAccount("[PASSWORD]") ... "[PK]" Where [PASSWORD] is the password for this account, because ZORRO does not store the user’s private key. If there is no operation for 5 minutes, the account will be locked.
